about_the_game:
Echo's Climb is a challenging adventure platformer.

Explore a Unique, Interconnected World

You'll explore a kingdom frozen in stone, ascend the various locales and collect echoes of the past, all to hopefully return these lands to their former glory.

Conquer Interesting Jumping Puzzles

Echo's Climb is a challenging adventure platformer. You'll jump your way through interesting spatial trials, requiring a mixture of deduction and skill to summit.

Later on you can replay these ordeals in Speed Trials to truly test yourself, racing against ghosts of your previous runs.

Demo

The demo is an early alpha that show's the kind of game Echo's Climb will be.

Included in the demo:

  • 1h+ of gameplay

  • 13 collectables to find

  • Ghost Replays

  • Leaderboards & Achievements

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8250U (4 * 1800) or equivalent; AMD Phenom II X4 965 (4 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti (3072 VRAM); Radeon HD 6850 (1024 VRAM)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K (4 * 3400) or equivalent; AMD FX-8350 (8 * 4700) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 ( 2048 MB); Radeon RX 460 4096 VRAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
